text: Horace Valentin Crocicchia (6 November 1888http://data.bnf.fr/11141348/horace_crocicchia/ - 1976) was a colonial administrator in various colonies of the French Colonial Empire. ==Titles Held== ==See also== *List of colonial governors in 1942 *List of colonial governors in 1943 *List of colonial governors in 1944 *Colonial heads of Guinea *Colonial heads of Côte d'Ivoire ==References== Category:French colonial governors and administrators Category:People of French West Africa Category:Governors of French India Category:1888 births Category:1976 deaths
title: Horace Valentin Crocicchia
